author: djrtwo
content:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3531

So far, I've seen only positive input regarding the p2p changes in the above PR. Please send any signal you can by end of day today. If signal stays as is, we'll be cutting a release with this breaking change in the coming days
